title: Can't 'see more stats' when i try look anyone up in the league ladder tab
body:
hey guys,
when I try look at my own stats or someone elses stats on any person in my division (or just random people). when i click their name the 'see more stats' button is grey'ed out. Just wondering why this is?

replies.body:
Hey there,

This is currently a [known issue and is being worked on](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/HpUTbovb-known-issues-with-new-champ-select), this should hopefully be fixed within the next few patches.
